column4: Or, is there a better virtualization program that handles networking?
how do I find out my current wireless drivers in the terminal?
Open a terminal and type: lspci | grep Network
My mistake it only finds the Network controller in-use. The drivers I can't say if it'll find.
that only shows wlan0 not wlan1
how do I show the drivers for the wlan1 usb?
I have looked it up but getting only ways to show wlan0
I'm still not seeing it by just lspci by the way
